name: Knock Down: BrickFall 3D
description:
Improve the sniping abilities to hit various shaped targets and collect coins. Knock down, bomb, smash and collapse all the targets, solve puzzles, and advance to the next levels. Buy balls and bombs to blast and knock down even more brick targets. Use accurate bursts shooting to increase the target hit and cause a real brickfall.
Features:
*Free to play. Play as much as you can, no limits to play.
*One finger control, easy to play.
*Knocked down targets gives you balls and coins.
*Use coins to buy balls and bombs.
*No network required.
*Lots of various stages, obstacles and challenges.
